message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling this product to you. I think it could really benefit your business.  I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000.  I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, thanks for the offer.  While I understand your perspective, the value this product brings is significantly higher than your proposed price. I'm willing to meet you partway at $1,050,000. I believe this reflects the true worth of what I'm offering.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to pay $980,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I need to be upfront about the value of this product.  $1,025,000 is my final offer.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations in terms of ROI, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

I appreciate your confidence in the product's ROI, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to pay $990,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the benefits it will bring to my business.
